Target_Beneficiaries: Small and marginal landholding farmer families
Eligibility_Criteria: Indian resident; cultivable land ownership; excludes income tax payers and professionals
Benefits_Provided: Direct income support for agricultural inputs and domestic needs
Documents_Required: Aadhaar, Landholding papers (ROR), Bank Passbook
Application_Process: Self-registration on portal or via CSC; State govt verification

Eligibility_Criteria: Investment in viable post-harvest management projects or community farming assets
Benefits_Provided: Interest subvention and credit guarantee for post-harvest loss reduction
Documents_Required: Project Report (DPR), KYC, Land Proof, Udyam Registration
Application_Process: Online application on AIF portal; bank appraisal and sanction

Target_Beneficiaries: Individual farmers, Water User Associations, FPOs
Eligibility_Criteria: Contiguous cultivable land (~2 Ha); existing working boring; no grid connectivity
Benefits_Provided: Replacement of diesel pumps with standalone solar pumps
Documents_Required: Aadhaar, Khasra-Khatauni, Photo, Bank Details, Consent Form
Application_Process: Registration on State Nodal Agency portal; document upload

Eligibility_Criteria: Growing notified crops in notified areas
Benefits_Provided: Comprehensive crop insurance from pre-sowing to post-harvest
Loan_Amount_or_Subsidy: Sum Insured equal to Scale of Finance
Documents_Required: Aadhaar, Land Records, Sowing Declaration
Application_Process: Apply via bank, CSC, or National Crop Insurance Portal

Target_Beneficiaries: Traditional artisans and craftspeople in 18 trades
Eligibility_Criteria: Age >18; engaged in trade; one member per family; no govt employees in family
Benefits_Provided: Skill upgradation; Toolkit incentive; Collateral-free loans
Documents_Required: Aadhaar, Mobile, Bank Account, Ration Card
Application_Process: Register at CSC; 3-stage verification

Eligibility_Criteria: New micro-units; 8th pass for large projects
Benefits_Provided: Margin money subsidy; financial assistance for new ventures
Documents_Required: Aadhaar, Project Report, Caste Certificate, EDP Certificate
Application_Process: Online via KVIC portal; DLTFC selection

Eligibility_Criteria: Greenfield projects in Mfg, Services, Trading; 51% stake for target groups
Benefits_Provided: Facilitates bank loans for setting up first-time ventures
Documents_Required: Identity/Address Proof, Caste Certificate, Project Report
Application_Process: Approach bank branch or standupmitra portal

Eligibility_Criteria: Vending on/before March 24, 2020; Identity Card/CoA
Benefits_Provided: Micro-credit to restart business; interest subsidy; digital cashback
Documents_Required: Aadhaar, Vending ID, KYC
Application_Process: Application via portal or mobile app; ULB verification

Eligibility_Criteria: Innovation-driven; < ? 10L govt support; >51% Indian ownership
Benefits_Provided: Financial assistance for POC, prototype development, market entry
Documents_Required: DPIIT Certificate, COI, Pitch Deck, KYC
Application_Process: Online application via Startup India portal to 3 incubators

Target_Beneficiaries: Girl children under 10 years of age
Eligibility_Criteria: Opened by guardian; max 2 girls per family
Benefits_Provided: High-interest tax-free savings for education/marriage
Documents_Required: Birth Certificate, KYC of parent, Photo
Application_Process: Visit designated Bank or Post Office to submit SSA-1 form

Eligibility_Criteria: Resident Indian; Individual single-holder account
Benefits_Provided: Fixed interest for 2-year tenor; 40% partial withdrawal allowed
Documents_Required: Aadhaar, PAN, Pay-in-Slip
Application_Process: Submit Form-1 at Post Office or authorized Banks

Eligibility_Criteria: Age ?19; first live birth or second girl child
Benefits_Provided: Cash incentive for nutrition and wage loss compensation
Documents_Required: Aadhaar, MCP Card, Bank Passbook, Birth Certificate
Application_Process: Apply at Anganwadi Centre or through PMMVY-CAS portal

Eligibility_Criteria: Secured admission to recognized Higher Education Institutions
Benefits_Provided: Single window for education loans; interest subvention
Documents_Required: Admission Letter, Fee Structure, Marksheets, KYC
Application_Process: Online via Vidya Lakshmi portal; fill Common Application Form

Target_Beneficiaries: SC, ST, DNT, Landless Labourer students
Eligibility_Criteria: Master's/PhD abroad; <35 yrs; >60% marks; income < ? 8L
Benefits_Provided: Full support for foreign studies; tuition, living, and travel
Documents_Required: Caste/Income Certificate, Marksheets, Offer Letter, Passport
Application_Process: Apply online on NOS portal during Feb/Mar window

Eligibility_Criteria: Living in kucha house; SECC 2011 deprivation markers
Benefits_Provided: Financial assistance for pucca house with basic amenities
Documents_Required: Aadhaar, Bank details, MGNREGA Job Card
Application_Process: Verification by Gram Sabha; registration via mobile app

Eligibility_Criteria: SECC 2011 criteria; families with PWD or SC/ST
Benefits_Provided: Cashless secondary and tertiary hospitalization cover
Documents_Required: Aadhaar Card, Ration Card (NFSA)
Application_Process: Check eligibility on portal; visit empanelled hospital

Eligibility_Criteria: Age 18-40; must have bank account; not income tax payer
Benefits_Provided: Guaranteed minimum pension after age 60
Documents_Required: Aadhaar Card, Savings Bank Account
Application_Process: Register via bank branch or internet banking

Eligibility_Criteria: Resident of Bihar; age up to 25; completed 10+2
Benefits_Provided: Financial assistance for general and professional courses
Documents_Required: Admission letter, Fee schedule, Marksheets, KYC
Application_Process: Apply via Awas Sahayata portal or DRCC centers

Eligibility_Criteria: Enrolled in govt schools; ST/SC/OBC/BPL category
Benefits_Provided: Free bicycle for school commute to reduce dropout
Documents_Required: Enrollment certificate, BPL Card, Caste Certificate
Application_Process: Distribution through school management committees

Eligibility_Criteria: Parents registered with UP BOCW Board for ?3 years
Benefits_Provided: Free residential education, boarding, and clothing
Documents_Required: Worker ID, Birth certificate, Previous records
Application_Process: Registration via the Labor Department of Uttar Pradesh

Target_Beneficiaries: SC and Handicapped people in Punjab
Eligibility_Criteria: Resident of Punjab; SC category or ?40% disabled
Benefits_Provided: Low-interest loans for income-generating small businesses
Documents_Required: Caste/Disability Certificate, KYC, Project plan
Application_Process: Application to Punjab SC Land Development Corp

Eligibility_Criteria: Age 20-35; family income < ? 2L; 12th pass minimum
Benefits_Provided: Monthly allowance for a period of up to 3 years
Documents_Required: Degree/Marksheet, Employment Exchange card, Income proof
Application_Process: Registration at Employment Exchange; apply via portal

Eligibility_Criteria: Student in govt school/college; family income criteria
Benefits_Provided: Annual scholarship and one-time grant for higher education
Documents_Required: Birth Certificate, Enrollment Proof, Income affidavit
Application_Process: Processed through school/college nodal officers

Eligibility_Criteria: Age 18-55; annual income < ? 1.5 Lakh
Benefits_Provided: Interest-free or subsidized loans for micro-enterprise
Documents_Required: Aadhaar, Caste certificate, Income certificate, Business plan
Application_Process: Apply via Karnataka State Women's Development Corp

Eligibility_Criteria: Functional clusters of 500+ artisans; land availability
Benefits_Provided: CFCs, infrastructure, design, and marketing support
Documents_Required: Cluster proposal, artisan list, land docs
Application_Process: Apply via Nodal Agency (KVIC/Coir Board) to Ministry

Eligibility_Criteria: Opened by parent/guardian on behalf of minor
Benefits_Provided: Early-start retirement planning; flexible contribution
Documents_Required: Birth Certificate of minor, KYC of guardian
Application_Process: Register through banks or e-NPS portal

Scheme_Name: Credit Guarantee Scheme for Micro & Small Enterprises (CGTMSE)
Target_Beneficiaries: New and existing Micro and Small Enterprises
Eligibility_Criteria: Valid Udyam Registration; business viability
Benefits_Provided: Collateral-free credit facility; credit guarantee for lenders
Documents_Required: Udyam Certificate, KYC, Business Plan
Application_Process: Through Member Lending Institutions (Banks)

Target_Beneficiaries: OBC, EBC, DNT students in Class 9-12
Eligibility_Criteria: Household income < ? 2.5L; studying in identified Top Schools
Benefits_Provided: Grants for tuition, hostel fees, and school charges
Documents_Required: Aadhaar, Income certificate, Marksheet, Caste certificate
Application_Process: Application via National Scholarship Portal (NSP)

Eligibility_Criteria: Udyam registration; age >18; focus on agro-rural sector
Benefits_Provided: Network of Livelihood Business Incubators; machinery support
Documents_Required: Udyam Registration, DPR, KYC
Application_Process: Submit proposal via Mentor Institute on ASPIRE portal

Eligibility_Criteria: Reducing chemical fertilizer use in Agriculture
Benefits_Provided: Incentivizing adoption of bio-fertilizers and alternative technology
Documents_Required: NA
Application_Process: Monitored by Ministry of Chemicals and Fertilizers

Eligibility_Criteria: Women engaged in agriculture/livelihood activities
Benefits_Provided: Technical training and financial support for sustainable agriculture
Documents_Required: KYC, Land/SHG details
Application_Process: Implementation through DAY-NRLM agencies

Eligibility_Criteria: Coir production/processing units with Udyam Registration
Benefits_Provided: Skill upgradation, machinery support, and market assistance
Documents_Required: Udyam Certificate, ID Proof, Bank Details
Application_Process: Apply via Coir Board website or regional offices

Eligibility_Criteria: Registered with the UDYAM registration portal
Benefits_Provided: Subsidy on certification cost; handholding and tech upgradation
Loan_Amount_or_Subsidy: Joining reward of ? 10,000; up to 100% subsidy for women
Documents_Required: Udyam Registration Certificate
Application_Process: Apply through online ZED portal

Eligibility_Criteria: Innovative ideas; Valid Udyam Registration
Benefits_Provided: Support for incubation, design intervention, and IPR protection
Loan_Amount_or_Subsidy: Up to ? 15 Lakh per idea; Up to ? 40 Lakh for design
Documents_Required: Udyam Registration, Idea Pitch, KYC
Application_Process: Apply at the MIS portal (innovative.msme.gov.in)

Scheme_Name: Credit Guarantee Scheme for Subordinate Debt (CGSSD)
Eligibility_Criteria: Operational MSMEs stressed/NPA as on 30.04.2020
Benefits_Provided: Support to promoters for infusing equity into stressed units
Loan_Amount_or_Subsidy: 50% of stake or ? 75 Lakh whichever is lower
Documents_Required: Financial Statements, NPA Status, KYC
Application_Process: Approach eligible Banks for sub-debt facility

Eligibility_Criteria: MSMEs with definite growth plans and listing potential
Benefits_Provided: Growth capital through equity, quasi-equity, and debt
Documents_Required: Business Plan, Financial Audits, Udyam Registration
Application_Process: Provision through Daughter Funds (AIFs)

Eligibility_Criteria: Targeting performance enhancement via State agencies
Benefits_Provided: Access to market, finance, and technology upgradation
Loan_Amount_or_Subsidy: Enhancing outreach of existing MoMSME schemes
Documents_Required: Business details, Udyam Certificate
Application_Process: Implementation through State agencies

Target_Beneficiaries: EWS, LIG, and MIG urban families
Eligibility_Criteria: No pucca house; specific income brackets (EWS < ? 3L)
Benefits_Provided: Interest subsidy on home loans; construction grants
Documents_Required: Aadhaar, Income certificate, Bank details, Land papers
Application_Process: Online via PMAY-U portal; ULB assessment

Eligibility_Criteria: Admitted to recognized skill development course
Benefits_Provided: Loans for technical education and skill training
Documents_Required: Admission proof, Marksheets, ID/Address proof
Application_Process: Apply via banks or Vidya Lakshmi portal

Eligibility_Criteria: Women entrepreneurs from backward backgrounds
Benefits_Provided: Term loans for self-employment and independence
Documents_Required: Caste Certificate, Income Certificate, KYC
Application_Process: Managed by NBCFDC through State Channelising Agencies
